caption.p: Sustained Catalyst Performance of 15% Ni/Nb 2O 5 in the Recycling Experiments at 200°C

Performance of 15%Ni/Nb 2O 5 in the conversion of diphenyl ether at 200°C throughout the recycling experiments. Reaction conditions for each cycle: diphenyl ether (13.5 mmol), n-dibutyl ether (3.64 mmol, as an internal standard for GC analysis), methylcyclohexane (70 mL, solvent), catalyst (0.500 g), H 2 pressure of 4 MPa (at room temperature), reaction time of 240 min, and stirring rate of 400 rpm. Note that time measurement began upon reaching a temperature of 200°C (ca. 20 min ramp time).
